title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set

Bring effortless holiday charm to your home with this Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. Designed for easy decorating and long-lasting beauty, it pairs a lush, 23.6-inch wreath with an 8.8-foot garland—both pre-lit with warm LED lights for a welcoming seasonal glow.

Key Features:
- Complete set: 23.6-inch wreath + 8.8-foot garland
- Rich seasonal decor: snowflake pine needle branches, two types of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches for a full, festive look
- Warm ambiance: 100 warm LED lights across the set
- Convenient lighting: battery-operated (3 AA, not included) with an automatic timer—6 hours on, 18 hours off
- Ready to display: no assembly required
- Quality materials: sturdy, high-quality, hypoallergenic greenery with fireproof pins
- Durable and low maintenance: no watering, won’t fade, made to last season after season
- Versatile use: suitable for indoor and outdoor display; perfect for walls, doors, fireplaces, living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, and windows
- Worry-free support: 365-day warranty and 24-hour customer service

Why You’ll Love It:
This set delivers instant holiday style without the hassle. The natural-looking, snow-dusted greenery and mixed decorations create a premium, wintry effect, while the warm lights and built-in timer make it effortless to enjoy every evening. Designed to withstand the season and beyond, it’s a smart, beautiful upgrade for your holiday decor.

What’s Included:
- 1 pre-lit wreath (23.6 in diameter)
- 1 pre-lit garland (8.8 ft length)
- Integrated 100 warm LED lights (battery pack; 3 AA batteries required, not included)

Care and Use:
- Indoor/outdoor safe; keep battery pack protected from direct moisture
- Fluff branches upon arrival for best fullness
- Use the timer function for energy-efficient, set-and-forget lighting

Satisfaction Guaranteed:
Enjoy peace of mind with a 365-day warranty and responsive 24/7 customer support. Bring home timeless holiday elegance that lights up every space effortlessly.
